title: SAVE THESE 2025-2026 DATES<
text:
SATURDAY COFFEE resumes this Saturday, November 15th at 9:00am.

            ***PLEASE NOTE: $2.00 PER PERSON***

            Please consider signing up to Host a Saturday Coffee.

          
            CHRISTMAS Decorating at the Pools, week of December 1st.  Exact date: TBD

          
            LADIES LUNCHEON: n\
            TUESDAY, JANUARY 20thn
\
          
            GARAGE SALE SET-UP: 

            FRIDAY, JANUARY 23rd


          
            GARAGE SALE: 

            SATURDAY, JANUARY 24th


          
            VALENTINE'S PIZZA PARTY: 

            FRIDAY, FEBRUARY 13th

            SATURDAY, FEBRUARY 21st


          
            LAST HURRAH DINNER DANCE: 

            SUNDAY, MARCH 15th


          
            WATCH THE BULLETIN BOARDS FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION, SIGN-UP SHEETS AND EVENTS!

            WE WOULD APPRECIATE HAVING ADDITIONAL HELP ON THE SOCIAL COMMITTEE.

            IF YOU ARE INTERESTED IN JOINING THE COMMITTEE OR ASSISTING WITH THE GARAGE SALE OR OTHER EVENTS,

            PLEASE GET IN TOUCH WITH PAT JAMISON 406-600-8661 E-103 or MARSHA BOSAK 810-333-2871 K-103

title: Volunteer Signup
meta: Spring Cleanup • Sign up for a role
text:
Roles we’re looking to fill:
- Check-in table
- Refreshment station
- Trash and recycling team
- Photo / social media

title: Thank You!
text:
A huge thank you to everyone who helped with last month’s fundraiser.

We exceeded our goal and it wouldn’t have been possible without you.
